name: Seagull Bird Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Fly in the sky above the ocean surface and live the life of an ordinary seagull! Search for food to survive and explore seashore and city blocks as a bird! Meet other seagulls to join your flock, fight against city and seaside predators and communicate with other animals! Maintain health, hunger and energy rate to set up a flock of seagulls with this seabird survival simulator in 3D!
Explore the sky like a scavenging bird of prey, avoid being a prey yourself and survive at all costs with Seagull Bird Survival Simulator 3D! Build nest and protect it from aggressive animals ‘til nestling fly out!
Fight against other seagulls or recruit them to your flock!
Seagull Bird Survival Simulator 3D features:
Great sea bird survival simulator
Ability to make and protect nest
Seaside and city animals as your friends or enemies
Do you love animal simulators? Try this seagull simulator, spread your wings and fly in the sky! Check Seagull Bird Survival Simulator 3D and live the life of a city scavenger!
